section.title: Customising Packages
section.para: Some packages in Nixpkgs have options to enable or disable optional functionality or change other aspects of the package. For instance, the Firefox wrapper package (which provides Firefox with a set of plugins such as the Adobe Flash player) has an option to enable the Google Talk plugin. It can be set in configuration.nix as follows: nixpkgs.config.firefox.enableGoogleTalkPlugin = true;

warning.para: Unfortunately, Nixpkgs currently lacks a way to query available configuration options.
